projectGridLines.stationName: Sequoia Fitness and Sports Technology Pvt Ltd,  Gurgaon
projectGridLines.title: Title: GoForFit Active Connect
projectGridLines.description:
Title: GoForFit Active Connect

 

About Us:

Join our dynamic team at Sequoia Fitness and Sports Technology Pvt Ltd, where we blend technology with sports and fitness to create innovative solutions for Education and Sports communities. We have positively impacted 7.7 Million Children across India, Russia, Iran and Nepal through innovative technology based initiatives like Khelo India Fitness Assessment, Fit India, Swasth Bachche Swasth Bharat and Sports Integrated Curriculum and Skill Development.

 

Description of Work:

As an intern, you'll have the chance to work on an exciting App on Fitness and Sports that impacts how people engage with sports, education, and fitness. To build the best App in the country of Fitness and Sports.

 

Responsibilities:

- Develop Laravel based backend solutions.

- Design and implement UI components using React

- Build/support Android / iOS App development

- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.

- Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.

- Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.

 

Requirements:

- Proficiency in Laravel PHP framework and MySQL database management.

- Experience in frontend development using React.

- Strong understanding of RESTful APIs.

- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git).

- Passion for sports and fitness is a plus.

 

Benefits:

- Gain hands-on experience in a dynamic startup environment.

- Mentorship and learning opportunities from experienced developers.
